Html:
I just switched to Ultima Hosts because godaddy was not working. Its been much easier so far except when I try to register on the site I get this error:

'System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider' requires a database compatible with schema version one.

How do I fix this? Can someone direct me on how to get the site working on Ultima Hosts?

Thanks in advance.
Ask Ultima... they would probably know what that error implies. (All you have to do is send an email to support@ultimahost.net describing your problem.)

I have finally worked out many of my errors by running the aspnet_regsql.exe on my server.

However, I am back to square one, my roles table is empty!

I am able to register as a user, however I don't know how to become admin with an empty role table.

Any help is appreciated! Excited to get this great site working.

Thanks.
Open the ASP.NET Configuration tool in visual studio (with your correct connection string) and add the roles "Administrators", "Blogger", and "Editor". Then assign yourself those roles.
